channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins

item.title: CVE-2019-1003004|2024-08-05T03:00:19.430Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: An improper authorization vulnerability exists in Jenkins 2.158 and earlier, LTS 2.150.1 and earlier in core/src/main/java/hudson/security/AuthenticationProcessingFilter2.java that allows attackers to extend the duration of active HTTP sessions indefinitely even though the user account may have been deleted in the mean time.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003003|2024-08-05T03:00:19.280Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: An improper authorization vulnerability exists in Jenkins 2.158 and earlier, LTS 2.150.1 and earlier in core/src/main/java/hudson/security/TokenBasedRememberMeServices2.java that allows attackers with Overall/RunScripts permission to craft Remember Me cookies that would never expire, allowing e.g. to persist access to temporarily compromised user accounts.
